idea-plugin.name: Base16 PaperColor Light
idea-plugin.vendor: Jon Leopard (http://github.com/jonleopard) based on PaperColor Theme (https://github.com/NLKNguyen/papercolor-theme), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 PaperColor Light for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Jon Leopard (http://github.com/jonleopard) based on PaperColor Theme (https://github.com/NLKNguyen/papercolor-theme). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
